price: und daß du darin weder dürstest noch Sonnenhitze erleidest.
arabic: وَأَنَّكَ لَا تَظۡمَؤُاْ فِيهَا وَلَا تَضۡحَىٰ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: wa-annaka lā taẓma-u fīhā walā taḍḥā
